item.title: Intel Gets Up To $7.9 Billion Award for U.S. Chip-Plant Construction
item.description: The government grant is less than originally expected because the chip giant is also receiving separate funding for defense-related projects.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on STV Group, Baidu, WiseTech Global and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on “Wicked,” Bilibili, Baidu and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: TikTok CEO Seeks Musk's Counsel on Incoming Trump Administration
item.description: The popular video app and Chinese parent ByteDance view the rival social-media owner as a conduit to the president-elect.

item.title: AI's Future and Nvidia's Fortunes Ride on the Race to Pack More Chips Into One Place
item.description: Musk’s xAI and Meta are among those building super clusters of computer servers with as many as 100,000 of Nvidia’s most advanced chips.
